001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.models;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
004
005/**
006 * Packet represents the raw byte string included within a single Bluetooth response packet
007 *
008 * A combination of Packet's sent over a Bluetooth characteristic by one end of the BT communication
009 * represents one {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message}.
010 */
011public class Packet {
012    private final byte packetsRemaining;
013    private final byte transactionId;
014    private final byte[] internalCargo;
015
016    public Packet(byte packetsRemaining, byte transactionId, byte[] internalCargo) {
017        this.packetsRemaining = packetsRemaining;
018        this.transactionId = transactionId;
019        this.internalCargo = internalCargo;
020    }
021
022    public byte[] build() {
023        byte[] ret = new byte[internalCargo.length + 2];
024        ret[0] = (byte)packetsRemaining;
025        ret[1] = transactionId;
026        System.arraycopy(internalCargo, 0, ret, 2, internalCargo.length);
027        return ret;
028    }
029
030    public byte transactionId() {
031        return transactionId;
032    }
033
034    public byte[] internalCargo() {
035        return internalCargo;
036    }
037
038    public Packet merge(Packet newPacket) {
039        return new Packet(newPacket.packetsRemaining, transactionId, Bytes.combine(this.internalCargo, newPacket.internalCargo));
040    }
041
042}
